resources.string: Accedi per autorizzare la lettura e la modifica dei fogli Google Sheet

The unique identifier for a spreadsheet. It\'s a particular string containing letters, numbers, and some special characters that reference a spreadsheet and it can be derived from the spreadsheet\'s URL. Spreadsheet IDs are stable, even if the spreadsheet name changes.\n\nhttps://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/SPREADSHEET_ID/
